name: 60s To Die, WOWIEEEEE!
description:
hi this is 60s To Die Wowieeeeeeeeeeeee !

this game took me less then 1 day, but oh god i am running out of time, ITS REALLY CLOSE, i need to revise, so pls help me with ratings :D

Note : a second update has been added, its only an urgent bug fixing one, nothing else.

The bugs fixed : The player can't finish level 2 cause of a trigger.

broken main menu.

Missing colliders.

Missing Scenes.

Missing Text.

& thats it, gl with the game :D.
